oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Ace Show - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of excerpts from an American Ace Coffee show. Featuring Grant Turner (host/announcer), and performers Minnie Pearl, Pee Wee King, Cowboy Copas, Golden West Cowboys, and Grandpa Jones.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Golden West Cowboys; Grandpa Jones; Cowboy Copas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Ace jingle (Minnie Pearl) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Grant Turner introduces Pee Wee King, Golden West Cowboys, Grandpa Jones, Cowboy Copas and Minnie Pearl -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Pee Wee King talks -- Fililpino Baby (Cowboy Copas) -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Grant Turner talks -- American Ace commercial (Minnie Pearl and Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: American ace show (Radio program); Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996; King, Pee Wee, 1914-2000; Golden West Cowboys (Musical group); Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Copas, Cowboy;
